The paragraph describes a scientific study that was conducted on erythrocytes (red blood cells) from healthy volunteers. The study measured three parameters: cytosolic Ca2+ activity, cell volume, and PS exposure. These parameters were determined using Flow Cytometry Analysis System (FACS) and are not considered diseases.
